website_summaries.verdict: A mobile gaming solution that plays like a console but fits in your pocket. Exclusive titles make this a must for any PlayStation fanatic.
pros: The Vita's game streaming can play games from any PS4 console on your home network
Easier to transport than the Nintendo Switch
cons: Battery life is good, but not great
Not all games are compatible for streaming from a PS4

customer_reviews.title: Great for remote play around the house
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I got it exclusively to use with remote play and I couldn't be happier. Even though this is a Japanese import and the X and O buttons are swapped, the button assignment can be changed under accessibility settings to switch them around. Now it functions like a normal North American Vita.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described. It came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The description was used, like new, with minor scratches on the back. What I received was a vita with a lifted screen in the bottom left corner. At first I was fine with it until I realized the lifted screen caused the memory card slot to be blocked. This made the vita impossible to use since no memory card could be inserted. The vita is a great handheld and I would recommend it to anyone interested. Just look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Best place to get a vita
customer_reviews.text: Came with 3.65 ofw, stickered closed box and perfect console.
customer_reviews.author: Zepplin76

customer_reviews.title: Just about right!
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to get here and was a little less than the condition I was expecting but it was very minor, It didn't come with a charger as it seemed it was supposed to but I have enough android chargers that I'll be fine with it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Will Probably Be The Last Handheld Videogame System I Buy
customer_reviews.text: Not because it's that great or anything, but with smartphones, the handheld videogame system market has crashed. The Vita, after having it for around a year, admittedly doesn't get played that often anymore. I like that I can use it for playing my PS4 system remotely. Technically you can do the same for like two PS3 games as well. The biggest flaw I found was how the system makes my hands/wrist feel after playing for longer than 30 minutes. It's got a nice screen, touchscreen is cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Sydd Gribbler

customer_reviews.text: Just recieved mine today with the box and vita looks Amazing 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Luis Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I bought a dud or what.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine used. To be clear, though, this is the Japanese version of the Vita. Regardless, the Vita I received seemed to be in great condition and worked quite well for about a week before developing an odd habit of suddenly shutting off in the middle of a game and needing its sense of time reset. The more this happened, the shorter it got. It won't even turn on at all now. No, I'm not forgetting to charge it. It won't even turn on while it's plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Very well crafted piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.text: I love this console. I had the PSP too but this is better and more comfortable. The only downside is that I cannot make the Remote Play to work outside of my home. I have a strong internet connection but it cannot connect sadly because this is the main reason for me to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Svilen

customer_reviews.title: The import is amazing
customer_reviews.text: For anyone that wants a different colored PS Vita 2000, I would recommend the imported one. You can play any American, European or Japanese game because all of Sony's consoles are region-free. Please don't hesitate. It feels so much better in your hands, and the LCD scrren is, in my opinion, better than the OLED one. The only downfall is the switched O and X buttons, but after a couple of days, you'll get used to it. Don't forget, the original PS1's confirm button was O not X. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Dessureau

customer_reviews.title: Best handheld device ever
customer_reviews.text: Love the PS4 on the go feature, also the wealth of JRPG's is amazing. My favorite handheld device 😊
customer_reviews.author: @animesempai0 on twitter!

customer_reviews.title: Love it <3<3
customer_reviews.text: I love the the psvita slim it works great. One thing though I don't think everything is made from Japan even though it came from it. I think the battery might be the only thing from china, but regardless everything works amazing. Couldn't be super happy. I give it a 5 stars for fast shipping because when I ask if they could send it to me sooner didn't expected to send it to me soon, but they did. Very satisfy. Would definitely buy from the company again :)
customer_reviews.author: Adrian E. P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Device
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Best handheld I think I've ever owned. Feels better in the hand than a 3DS. Games are better looking and easier to control than a 3ds as well. Too bad there is going to be no more support from Sony for this device. I hope they make a follow up to it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Lowen264

customer_reviews.title: Ask before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Item came with scratches all over (seller fail to mention that ) . beside scratches, its working fine fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Assaf ben ezra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought new and thus the quality of the product was top notch. a real premium feel to it. since most games are on PSN I recommend getting a 32 gigs memory card. we still have well over a 1000 games available for the console, it is still going strong. remote play i tested successfully. X and O keys are inverted but easily fixable though that impacts in-game as well. I'd just get used to using O to accept and X to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Usman

customer_reviews.title: Great product but unsafe packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I love the system! It works great and I’m very happy with the condition and the price. I was concerned about the lack of protection during shipping though. I opened the box to find the product moving around quite a bit in the box due to a lack of protection. I’m very lucky that it wasn’t damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Right Stick Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: Everything else works fine, but the right analog stick doesn’t work up or down. This wasn’t advertised and it really upsets me because it’s my birthday and this is like, the only time I can splurge myself due to my parents divorce.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Works great and came in excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: Was able to change the language over to English from Japanese with no problems since it was an import. Works great and came in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Pinkstock

customer_reviews.title: Great for indies and retro games.
customer_reviews.text: The specific one I got was from Japan and I didn’t notice that beforehand. The only difference with that is that x and circle are in different spots by default in the main menu sections. Otherwise it works but did have a black spot on the display that isn’t small and that wasn’t listed.
customer_reviews.author: Issac M. Grier

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little mobile device and you can download a slew of old PlayStation games on it through the ps store, in addition to great new games.
customer_reviews.author: AnarchyMary

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Vita! And really loving the price of games. I rarely purchase just released consoles simply because the games are outrageous. The vita also has great graphics for a handheld and a pretty impressive battery life. Well worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: PS Vita
customer_reviews.text: I like the screen brightness, the max playtime, and battery quality. It's a quite well made device and really shows. Decent game library because it includes the PS One and PSP library. Really nice feeling device.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: New unit in perfect condition. Arrived 3 weeks early. Came with 8gig memory card. All documentation is in Japanese but was expected as it’s a Japanese version. Easily sets up in English. Zero complaints about product or seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jidy

customer_reviews.title: Like new
customer_reviews.text: I could barely tell it was used except for some very light scratches and some fingerprints on the screen. I cleaned it up and it looked really good. No problems so far. The buttons, joysticks, and triggers are still working well, no signs of looseness or lag. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Device did not work- awful customer service
customer_reviews.text: The device never worked or charged. We didn’t have any internal memory, so by the time we got all the components needed the return window had closed. Waiting to hear back from vendor. Vendor refused to replace device. Would give less than one star if possible. This was my sons bday gift he purchased with a giftcard.
customer_reviews.author: Rehana Perera

customer_reviews.title: PS Vita
customer_reviews.text: Works great and it came with a case and all its cable. But if you are planning on downloading games on it, then also buy a PS Vita memory card because must game won't fit with the limited space it has.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon

customer_reviews.title: extreme recommended
customer_reviews.text: perfect protection box , on time even faster i expected. extreme recommended
customer_reviews.author: morteza

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great little toy. Got 3.68 perfect for modding. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: Cool little handheld, its a shame it doesnt have a Library like the 3DS tho still pretty cool tho
customer_reviews.author: Foolio

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: The Vita system has been fun to use and I've downloaded a few games onto it after getting a 64 GB SD card. The swapped buttons can be swapped again in the settings, so no worries about that. Overall a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Andre L Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Wait
customer_reviews.text: It came undamaged and works just like new. Came with everything I needed and was pre charged.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My sons this Japan Model Vita. I bought used from Amazon warehouse and it was in great condition. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: William Hemmingsen

customer_reviews.title: ... the price I will not complain and it works like new in very good condition
customer_reviews.text: Got it used but for the price I will not complain and it works like new in very good condition.
customer_reviews.author: philippe vu

customer_reviews.title: Great again!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Plays games simi-smoothly bogs down due to torches in terreria. But other than that is a great handheld!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gorham

customer_reviews.title: Broken R stick. Still a good rpg player
customer_reviews.text: When I got it everything was fine accept the right stick Does not work what so ever. So long as you dont plan on playing third or first person games it should be fine. More importanly be careful who you buy from. The retailer i bought from said it only had a cosmetic flaw. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Keighland Woods

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought brand new from Japan based seller. Arrived very well boxed and works great. Will play games from anywhere also. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic packaging for shipment. Unit just as described. Looks even better than in the picture and plays great!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D. Knopp

customer_reviews.title: Need instructions in English.
customer_reviews.text: It may have been a good purchase but all if the instructions were in Japanese.
customer_reviews.author: k5v9n

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product in great condition! Did not know it was a Japanese version (just switches x and o in some menus). But overall a great product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: It came in perfect condition. It's a great portable console
customer_reviews.text: It came in perfect condition. It's a great portable console, it has great variety of good games. I you liked the PSP you are going to love this.
customer_reviews.author: José Alonso Calderón Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great! Love the PSVita! Delivered as promised. Great service and delivered just in time.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy used products from them.
customer_reviews.text: I thought very good condition meant every function works, not a broken joystick.
customer_reviews.author: Dark

customer_reviews.title: I got what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: It's a Japanese vita with cables and light wear and tear around the edges. As expected.
customer_reviews.author: Garron Deveaux

customer_reviews.title: Like new
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! Near new condition and complete in box! I could not be happier with this seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Practically new.
customer_reviews.text: The system i received today was practically new. No scratches on the screen and minor prints on the back touchpad. You wouldn't even know that it was pre owned. Came with the charger, box and manual. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: SpScarecrow

customer_reviews.title: Broken or malfunctioning buttons
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but the Left trigger and Right trigger are broken and keep going off on their own when I’m not touching them. I wanted one that wasn’t partially broken but I am afraid if I return it I’ll get a worse one.
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Waiting, will update
customer_reviews.text: Got an empty box with a note saying my order would be overnighted. I’ll update the review when I get the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordy

customer_reviews.title: Ps Vita
customer_reviews.text: Vita came brand new and 5 days early. Definitely will be buying from last samurai again.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Used but not noticeably
customer_reviews.text: No issues except it had been used previously and not mentioned .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Good console
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and easy and Is in very great condition and I'm loving it a lot, I'm already used to the O and X being switched can't wait to play the Japanese games I got for this.
customer_reviews.author: ZOMBIE DOG

customer_reviews.title: SUPER fast shipper and item in GREAT shape!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged extremely well and SUPER fast shipping! Product in fantastic shape! Pleasantly surprised to see the screen entirely scratch free! Def a great experience. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Came Brand New!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product came quickly and was brand new. I love my os vita and would recommend anyone interested to get a new one while you still can!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: This is just awesome! I've been a Sony Playstation fan my whole life and now I can play anywhere. New as described and works beautifully. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Fantastic Service!
customer_reviews.text: This device is in perfect condition. I ordered this on July 10th and it was on my doorstep by July 15th, much sooner than the expected ETA!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: as described.
customer_reviews.text: As described, my only complaint is that it took about 3 weeks to be shipped out, after placing my order.
customer_reviews.author: Juan De Dios

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for your services thank you for putting your life at risk what's the covid-19 thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you it really benefits me I really like it amazing console for a handheld device thank you for your services.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Like original
customer_reviews.text: Very good just the x and the o are switched in the menu . But it is exactly like the original .arived in mint condition .
customer_reviews.author: Kizki

customer_reviews.title: Miss labeling product not new
customer_reviews.text: The product was not new like it said in the purchase which I payed a lot of money for. The product had scatchs and chipped glass.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy used
customer_reviews.text: If you buy a used one just know it will probably be a peice of junk
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: PSVITA Mobile PS worth being mobile
customer_reviews.text: Love how clear and all the options that come with it. Screen needs to be bigger, for older people who play.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a used but like new Vita and I’m completely satisfied how it came. It’s was pretty much new and was treated with care. I’m really happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aleny Ayala

customer_reviews.title: it works like any other Ps vita
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a Japan Import, it works like any other Ps vita. This console is amazing and underrated. I would definitely buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: Ye Vang

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t charge
customer_reviews.text: Device out of the box will not charge Tried new charger and everything else I can think of no change in battery percentage
customer_reviews.author: Mk93

customer_reviews.title: new brand
customer_reviews.text: i love it came like pic and new with box and every thing
customer_reviews.author: marwah

customer_reviews.title: Drift issues
customer_reviews.text: Should have been told there were drifting issues and now I have replace the joysticks to correct it.
customer_reviews.author: Seto Edogawa

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Pros and cons compared to ps vita1000 Con -bad screen quality(cheap LCD screen. Ps vita 1000 is using OLED) -thin. So bad grip Pros -Lighter -has 1gb internal memory -1.5times longer battery life -thiner (might be con for some people) I was worrying because many people said screen is horrible, but it is way better than i thought. It is still little bit worse than 1000's, but i like this one more than 1000 which is the old one.
customer_reviews.author: HML

customer_reviews.title: MESSED UP JOYSTICK
customer_reviews.text: The right stick is a little funky but it's doable just kinda wish it worked properly
customer_reviews.author: Singeek15

customer_reviews.title: Broken buttons
customer_reviews.text: Sent with broken buttons that don’t work in game. Only in menu. Couldn’t play any games at all
customer_reviews.author: YallMight

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing out of place, very satisfied. You can trust this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Dork Knight

customer_reviews.title: Dislike but still good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the fact With the Japanese import model it has X as back & O For Comfirm
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Dunnom

customer_reviews.title: Don't put water on it LOL
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent item I recommended I never had so much fun on a little console that can connect to the PS4 and the PS3
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made.Item came super fast way before the expected date,and quality of the P's vita 2000 is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Q B

customer_reviews.title: I'm not return the PlayStation
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to return my PlayStation and my son don't want it but I will usd it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: My PS VITA shipped very fast and looks great. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just work a lot so I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, works perfectly... Love it, just work a lot so I don't get to play it very often
customer_reviews.author: Kimani Burke

customer_reviews.title: Your password
customer_reviews.text: I like everything and I used the vita to play games.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Nova

customer_reviews.title: Shock and Awwww
customer_reviews.text: Slim goodness. I am impressed with the adaptations this Second Gen has taken. Though I do agree the screen on the First Gen was much better. I do know its a person by person preference. Totally enjoy the snappyness of the device. And have had no issues playing games either DLC or on Cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Received correct item ordered
customer_reviews.text: The only concern I had was that the gaming device I ordered did not have any kind of security sticker on the package showing that it had not been opened prior. The Japanese laws may be different I guess. The product works great and appears new.
customer_reviews.author: jacob.greathouse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra money if you can't/don't want to wait for the US version. Directions and box in Japanese, O and X buttons reversed on home screen, but that's it. Region free. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Harris228

customer_reviews.title: doesnt feel cheep!
customer_reviews.text: its better than the first more battery, slimer new micro usb b charge port but whole downfall is on the screen its lcd overall its great.
customer_reviews.author: rufino marchante

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is very nice i dislike how x is back and o is forward
customer_reviews.author: keb grinder

customer_reviews.title: Not OFC 3.60
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend for those looking for a PS Vita with official firmware 3.60. Mine came with 3.65.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: If you dont mind......
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this upgrade is great. But, if you don't mind........... the function of X and O button is reversed by the hardware and cannot be fixed from software due to religious reason. (X is confirm in US while cancel/wrong is JP)
customer_reviews.author: zduan

customer_reviews.title: Crack
customer_reviews.text: Small crack in lower left corner. Was not as fully described.
customer_reviews.author: Aeons3
